story_20_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Today’s the day! I can’t believe the PML finals
are finally here!
story_20_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I woke up sooo early this morning!
I guess I must have been too excited to sleep!
story_20_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Sounds like Acerola’s been ready to go since
the crack of dawn, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_20_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
How about you? Were you able to sleep OK
last night?
story_20_01000/2401_0401_0700_10:
Nice! Getting a good night’s sleep is really
important if you wanna be able to give it
your all in battle!
story_20_01000/2401_0402_0900_10:
Lear... I guess it would be hard not to think
about him after that battle yesterday.
story_20_01000/2401_0402_1000_10:
But don’t worry! I’m sure he’ll be back to his
usual snooty self at the opening ceremony today!
story_20_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Hey, why don’t we head to the arena now?
If we hurry, we might be the first ones there!
story_20_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I don’t think the arena’s open yet, but we could
always go out and have a battle or two to
strengthen our team!
story_20_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
You’ve gotten pretty famous around here, thanks
to all those victories, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
People in town will want to challenge you.
story_20_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
That’s true! We can probably battle all kinds
of Trainers now!
